experience.title: managing partner
experience.description: Run a boutique consulting firm helping lifestyle retail businesses scale up profitably.  Key services include providing Merchandizing solution using Data analytics and scaling up through franchising, both offered as outcome based services.  Expert in Product Licensing business( represented Warner Bros. Consumer Products for their Product Licensing business in India between 2009 and 2014 ).
